about_the_game:
Coin Eruption takes the classic coin pusher arcade experience to exhilarating new heights—literally! Set atop a majestic mountain, your goal is to strategically drop coins onto the pusher platform and watch as they cascade down, pushing more coins and prizes into your collection.

Key Features:

Epic Coin Pushing Action
Drop your coins and watch the physics-based pusher mechanism at work. Time your drops perfectly to maximize your haul and push even more coins over the edge!

Special Coins with Unique Effects
Collect special coins with distinct abilities. Upgrade their effects to supercharge your gameplay. Whether it's doubling your coin output, creating explosive cascades, or triggering rare events, these special coins are your key to mastery.

Unlockable Collectibles and Rewards
As you play, gather unique collectibles that unlock a variety of in-game rewards. These treasures are not just for show—they can provide significant boosts and enhance your coin pushing strategy.

Dynamic Volcano Eruptions
Experience the thrill of a volcano eruption that showers coins onto the pusher platform. These eruptions are spectacular events that can turn the tide of your game in an instant, offering massive rewards and excitement.

Autoplay Feature
Sit back and let the game play itself with the autoplay feature. Perfect for when you want to relax and watch the coins stack up without lifting a finger.

Avatars and Backgrounds
Customize your experience by unlocking new avatars and backgrounds. Show off your progress and achievements as you level up, making your game uniquely yours.

Leveling System
Progress through the game and earn experience points to level up. Each level brings new challenges and rewards, ensuring that the gameplay remains fresh and engaging.

Coin Eruption is not just a game; it's a captivating experience that combines strategy, skill, and a bit of luck. With stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay elements, and a plethora of features to explore, this game will keep you entertained for hours on end. Get ready to embark on an epic coin-pushing adventure and see how high you can climb!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
